Question: # of missed doses in past week
skip logic?: Show if Missed doses in past week is yes

Question: Send for admission
skip logic?: Show if Liver disease control is uncontrolled

Question: Reason for Hepatitis B treatment
Possible Answers: APRI score ≥ 1.5 or US Cirrhosis|Co-infection with HCV and or HIV|Hep B DNA (VL) ≥ 2000 and ALT ≥ 1.5 x upper limit|VL ≥ 2000 or HbeAg+ during pregnancy|VL not available during pregnancy
skip logic?: Show if Indication for Hepatitis B treatment is yes

Question: Hepatitis B medications
skip logic?: Show if On treatment for Hepatitis B is yes

skip logic?: Show if On treatment for Hepatitis B is yes

skip logic?: Show if On treatment for Hepatitis B is yes

Question: Response to treatment after 1 year
Possible Answers: complete (undetectable VL)|partial (decrease but persistent)|no response|lab not done
skip logic?: Show if On treatment for Hepatitis B is yes
